txt.en:
'You have done all you can here, [placeholder]. It is time to move on.

'Travel south until you reach the Isen, then head eastward along the shore until you find a large rock outcropping. There, you will find another of our scouts, Innoth.

'I am certain that Innoth will have as much need of your aid as I.'

'[placeholder], your name is spoken of well among the Rohirrim on these shores. This area had been quiet until recently, but in the past few days, there have been shadows emerging from every direction.'
'I believe Innoth will need your aid.'
You have done all you can in the western part of the Isendale, and now it is time to move on.
Talk to Innoth near the Isen

Innoth can be found by travelling south until you reach the Isen, then east along the shore until you reach the rocky outcropping where Innoth is encamped.\n\nGarrun has sent you on to speak with Innoth near the river Isen.
